descriptive.question: What is the color of the floor of the basketball court?
answer: There are two in the garden.
The floor is red and green.

explanatory.question: Why is [person_1] shooting basketball alone?
answer: [person_1] is put there for [person_1] to sit.

predictive.question: How is the weather going to be like?
answer: Most of the eggs will disappear from the ground.
The girl in long hair is going to turn off the camera.
reason: Because there are two bars of soap there.
The sky is covered with clouds.

Because her hair always prevents her from eating.

counterfactual.question: What will happen if [person_1] misses too many shots in the upcoming match?
answer: [person_1] will not be able to make smoke rings.
[person_1] would not be able to do weighted lunges.
reason: The ball would not go away so far.
